title: $:/temp/RemoteAssetInfo/https://tiddlywiki.com/library/v5.1.22/index.html/$:/plugins/tiddlywiki/codemirror-mode-htmlmixed
creator: jack
description: HTML mixed highlighting mode for CodeMirror
name: CodeMirror Mode HTML Mixed
readme: This plugin adds Syntax Highlighting for HTML tiddlers (text/html) to the [[CodeMirror|http://codemirror.net]] text editor. It needs the latest [[CodeMirror plugin|$:/plugins/tiddlywiki/codemirror]] to be installed
